subject: Re: Do I live only 3 minutes from where EVPs were first discovered?
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Zack,

My 3 minute drive is from the Colorado Springs lab where he was in 1899-
1900, I think.
It was on Knob Hill and I live in the Knob Hill section of Colorado 
Springs.
There are homes where his lab once was, and I've walked through the 
alley next to where the lab was a few times... just to be near where he 
did his fantastic work.

- Mike
